metadata.title: CVE-2024-26878 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:quota: Fix potential NULL pointer dereferenceBelow race may cause NULL pointer dereferenceP1					P2dquot_free_inode			quota_off					  drop_dquot_ref					   remove_dquot_ref					   dquots = i_dquot(inode)  dquots = i_dquot(inode)  srcu_read_lock  dquots[cnt]) != NULL (1)					     dquots[type] = NULL (2)  spin_lock(&dquots[cnt]->dq_dqb_lock) (3)   ....If dquot_free_inode(or other routines) checks inode's quota pointers (1)before quota_off sets it to NULL(2) and use it (3) after that, NULL pointerdereference will be triggered.So let's fix it by using a temporary pointer to avoid this issue.
